headline: This Undervalued Dividend Aristocrat Just Raised its Dividend
summary: On May 21, Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) declared a 1.4% hike in its dividend, which took its quarterly dividend to $0.71 per share. Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) is a leading medical device maker with operations spanning medical-surgical, neuroscience, cardiovascular, and diabetes segments. It recently announced its quarterly dividend alongside its financial results for fiscal Q4 and FY25. […]

headline: Medtronic (NYSE:MDT) Reports Q4 Revenue Increase To US$8,927 Million, Provides FY26 Guidance
summary: Medtronic (NYSE:MDT) recently reported impressive fourth-quarter results with sales and net income showing significant year-over-year increases. This may have helped the company's shares rise by 5% over the last month. The announced guidance for fiscal year 2026 also points toward continued growth, though external factors like currency fluctuations might pose challenges. The S&P 500 index remained relatively flat in the same period, indicating that Medtronic's robust earnings and strategic...

headline: Medtronic to Separate Diabetes Business
summary: Medical-device maker  Medtronic  plans to separate its diabetes business into a stand-alone company, the company said, in a move that hives off a division that had struggled but recently returned to growth.  Under Medtronic’s plan, the new unnamed company will also be publicly traded, Medtronic said.  The diabetes business generated nearly $2.8 billion in sales in its most recent fiscal year, ending in April, up 10.7% from the prior year.

The diabetes business generated nearly $2.8 billion in sales in its most recent fiscal year, ending in April, up 10.7% from the prior year.

headline: Tariffs Are Weighing on Medtronic. They Could Lift Costs by Nearly $1 Billion.

headline: Medtronic tariff impact, Canada Goose soars: Trending Tickers
summary: Medical device manufacturer Medtronic (MDT) is expecting a $200 million impact from tariffs as its full-year 2026 earnings forecast falls below estimates, according to a Bloomberg report. Luxury winter clothing brand Canada Goose (GOOS) are surging ahead by as much as 28% this morning after beating fourth quarter earnings estimates. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: Medtronic: Fiscal Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: DUBLIN (AP) — Medtronic PLC (MDT) on Wednesday reported fiscal fourth-quarter net income of $1.06 billion. The Dublin-based company said it had net income of 82 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for amortization costs and non-recurring costs, were $1.62 per share.

headline: Medtronic to separate diabetes business following recent struggles
summary: (Reuters) -Medical device maker Medtronic said on Wednesday it plans to separate its diabetes business, which houses its insulin pumps and other wearable devices, into a stand-alone company and forecast 2026 adjusted profit below estimates.  "It's ready to be a standalone company," Medtronic CEO Geoff Martha told Reuters in an interview.  "The diabetes business is in a really good spot right now, six quarters in a row (of) double digit growth and a really robust product pipeline... but as you go forward, the investment needs (to) continue, and it needs more focus" Martha said.

raw.headline: Medtronic to separate diabetes business following recent struggles

"The diabetes business is in a really good spot right now, six quarters in a row (of) double digit growth and a really robust product pipeline... but as you go forward, the investment needs (to) continue, and it needs more focus" Martha said.
